title: Ticket #5992: CERTIFICATE_MAPFILE should support hash keys as well as regex keys
description:
the CERTIFICATE_MAPFILE should make use of the new capability of the MapFile class, to have the second field be treated as a literal and a sequence of them turned into a single hashtable.

A new knob CERTIFICATE_MAPFILE_ASSUME_HASH_KEYS should enable this behavior. It should default to false in order to preserve backward compatibility.
remarks: assigned to Kent for review of documentation.
